Pre-Game Insights: The Houston Astros face the Detroit Tigers in Game 2 of the AL Wild Card series, aiming to even the series after dropping Game 1.
Hunter Brown will start for the Astros, who have been dominant against the Tigers in the regular season.
Tyler Holton will make the start for the Tigers, with limited starting experience but a solid relief record.
The Astros have a strong ATS record as home favorites, while the Tigers have struggled as road underdogs.
The total is set at 7.5, reflecting the expectation of a low-scoring game.
